name: Elevator (MightyBakersGames)
description:
The Elevator is a simulation of  lift to upper floors, but only, if you add some zombies and falling spikes.

This game is our first.

It contains:

Shop
Weapons
Awesome music
Original idea
and a lot of other things - download and you will see
